dict.acceptation: 促进，推进；提升，助长；促销；使（学生）升级；
成为王后或其他大于卒的子；

sent.orig: Shrink skin pores and promote contraction of blood vessels, promote internal protection and intensively hydrate.
sent.trans: 收细毛孔及促进血管的收缩，加强内在保护，深度补水。

sent.orig: The basic duty of political legal department is to defend stability, promote harmony, and promote development.
sent.trans: 政法机关的根本职责是维护稳定，促进和谐，促进发展。

sent.orig: Promote: This allows the guild leader to promote members within the guild to higher ranks.
sent.trans: 提升：这个功能允许会长将会员提升到高级阶层。

sent.orig: Promote-Players can promote other players in the guild.
sent.trans: 提拔–该成员能够提拔工会中的其他成员。

sent.orig: People-oriented and actively promote quality education and to promote the harmonious development of and students.
sent.trans: 以人为本，积极推进素质教育，促进师生和谐发展。
